alert.note: Alert for Polk; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:11PM CDT until July 21 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Scott County in western Arkansas... Northeastern Polk County in western Arkansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 311 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oliver to 8 miles southeast of Beauchamp, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mena... Beauchamp... Acorn... Y City... Rich Mountain... Winfield... Eagleton... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
